atha gasagena nalalatha wesak sanda walapeyi janelen hotu pereyi langapatha gedaraka themangula pinisa nimawu nelum mal satha thawama parawi natha pansiya panas jathaka eka pathata sinda thanu nuthana wi-jathakayaka wirindu sural rawaya thoranakin aathin ase ma idiriyehi his ma his kadadasiyaki kawiyak pinisa ahari bala inna ekenehi ma piyambaa aa mas kaballak kadadasiyehi pathithawa yoniyaka hadathala mawayi nisakawama ee koneshwarige wiya yuthuya ampara sita kolambaata piyambaa ennata me hati kalayak?

palath palana mathiwaranayen pasuwa udgatha wu arbudakari thaththwaya pilibandawa pahadili kirima sandaha agramathyawaraya wisin madhya aayathana pradhanin araliyagaha mandurata kandawa thibu athara, ehidi aanduwe idiri pawathma pilibandawa wisheshayen wisthara kerini. 2015 wasare pawathi janadhipathiwaranayedi maithripala sirisena mahatha lada jana waramata anuwa dan pawathina aakarayatama aanduwa thama agamathithwaya yatathe idiriyata gena yana bawada, ehidi amathya mandala sanshodhanayak sidu kirima sambandhawa sakachcha wemin pawathina bawa da hethema kiya sitiyeya.
ma pera kiwath men, lankawe wishwa widyala pilibandawa mage danuma dashaka dekak parani wima eyata hethuwak wimata hondatama ida atha.
